rules.description: Double-tap left command key to send ⌘+⌥+4
Change double tap right command key to command+option+2
Change double tap left shift key to command+option+3
Hyper Key: Caps Lock → left control + left shift + right command (⌃⇧⌘)
Remap keys to use Dvorak keyboard layout tharshi555 copy paste down up left right undo find4 redo capslock
Slack Layer 4 Integration (Nav Layer -> Slack Shortcuts)

manipulators.description: Slack: Cmd+F -> Edit Last Message (Up Arrow)
Caps Lock -> Hyper Key (Cmd+Ctrl+Opt+Shift). Esc if tapped alone.
Hyper + M -> Toggle Reduce Motion (Restarts Dock)

to.shell_command: current=$(defaults read com.apple.universalaccess reduceMotion 2>/dev/null || echo 0); next=$((1-current)); defaults write com.apple.universalaccess reduceMotion -int $next; killall Dock

manipulators.description: Chrome OR Gemini: Cmd+U -> Cmd+Shift+O (Open Bookmarks/Menu)
